name: Root Beat
description:
Slice, dice, and spice up the beat! Join the rhythm-infused kitchen adventure as you chop root vegetables to make the ultimate bowl of soup. Can you achieve the ultimate score and become the soup master? Get ready to be swept away by the beat of the pot!

---

This game was made during FGJ 2023:  https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/beat-root-2

Credits:

Jolle: Senior Developer

Ville: Programming

Roope: Programming

Iiro: 3D Art and Programming

Oskari: Music and Audio

Panu: 2D Art and Voiceovers
